name: dtb
description: The useful development toolbox for Node.js packages.
author: Richard Szakacs, richardszkcs@gmail.com, www.richardszkcs.com

scripts.prepare: npm run check && npm run doc && npm run test
scripts.release-major: npm run prepare && npm run gulp -- bump.major && npm run gulp -- stamp && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: npm run prepare && npm run gulp -- bump.minor && npm run gulp -- stamp && npm publish
scripts.release-patch: npm run prepare && npm run gulp -- bump.patch && npm run gulp -- stamp && npm publish
scripts.cover: npm run check && npm run test && istanbul check-coverage
scripts.report: npm run test -- --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
